Configure bypass fluid families

1 Click the Fluid Balance button .

Or, on the Template menu, click Fluid Balance.

2 In Format, select Triple pie chart.

3 Click Bypass fluids.

4 Under Available Fluids Families, select the names of the families to use for documenting bypass fluid intake and output.

5 Click >>. The bypass families are added to the selection list.

6 To remove a family from the selection list, click its name in Fluids Families for Bypass. Then click Delete.

7 Click Close.
